schemaDescription: query: string: The job search query (title, skills, company, etc.)
headless: boolean: Whether to run the browser in headless mode (default: True)
max_jobs: integer: Maximum number of jobs to scrape (default: 25)
remote: boolean: Include only Remote jobs (can be combined with others)
hybrid: boolean: Include Hybrid jobs (can be combined)
onsite: boolean: Include On-site jobs (can be combined)
skip_ai_enrichment: boolean: Deprecated. AI enrichment now runs via enrich_and_generate_answers().
metadata.actionSignature: action/args: 'query: str, headless: bool=True, max_jobs: int=25, remote: bool=False, hybrid: bool=False, onsite: bool=False, skip_ai_enrichment: bool=False'
